original_text: And he shall take of it his handful, of the flour of the meat offering, and of the oil thereof, and all the frankincense which is upon the meat offering, and shall burn it upon the altar for a sweet savour, even the memorial of it, unto the Lord.
korean_text: 그 소제의 고운 기름 가루 한 움큼과 소제물 위의 유향을 다 가져다가 기념물로 제단 위에서 불살라 여호와 앞에 향기로운 냄새가 되게 하고

sentences.original_text: And he shall take of it his handful
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것 중에서 한 줌을 가져올 것이며

sentences.original_text: of the flour of the meat offering
and all the frankincense which is upon the meat offering
and shall burn it upon the altar
